Posts.Content: I just have my first mammogram and it came back with a nodule on the left breast. I've always been told I have lumpy breasts, so I'm not surprised, but they want to do another x-ray and possibly an ultrasound. Should I be more concerned than I am? Also, what does the other x-ray involve? Is it like the mammogram or something else? Oh, breast cancer does not run in my family.
Posts.Title: First mammogram came back abnormal

Posts.Content: I recently had a core needle biopsy and now I have a bruise on my breast that's yellow and green. I guess since I was numb, I didn't notice how my pressure the radiologist was using, but is this normal? How long before it fades? It doesn't hurt, it's just green.
Posts.Title: Bruising after core needle biopsy normal?
